instructions: On your iPhone, go to Settings . Tap your name at the top of the Settings screen, then tap iCloud. Tap Photos in the iCloud settings screen and move the iCloud Photos toggle switch to the On/green position. To save space on your phone, tap Optimize iPhone Storage .
Go to the main Albums page in the Photos app. Tap the + sign in the upper-left corner to open a dialog box. Tap New Album . Enter a name for the new album, then tap Save .

While viewing an album of photos, such as the All Photos album, tap Select in the upper-right corner. Tap each photo you want to add to a new album. This places a blue circle with a checkmark on the selected photos. After you select the photos you want to move, tap Add To . Tap the New Album thumbnail. Type a name for the new album in the field provided, then tap Save to generate a new album filled with the selected photos.
